column2: food was really good. As for the deep dish pizza
column3: we had the Â Malnati Chicago Classic deep dish pizza as recommended by our server. The core of the pizza was good and cheesy
column4: though it was not as deep as I thought it would be. However
column5: it could be because we had the smaller pan. The crust was ok
column6: but I wish it was crispier.
